Uses of Interface
com.zebra.sdk.comm.Connection

  • Packages that use Connection 
    Package Description
    com.zebra.sdk.comm
    Provides implementation for communication protocols.
    com.zebra.sdk.common.card.printer
    Provides interfaces for card printer related functions.
    com.zebra.sdk.common.card.printer.discovery
    Provides interfaces for discovering Zebra card printers.
    com.zebra.sdk.printer.discovery
    Provides implementation for finding Zebra branded printers.

    • Uses of Connection in com.zebra.sdk.comm

      Subinterfaces of Connection in com.zebra.sdk.comm 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ConnectionWithWriteLogging
      A connection to a device that copies data sent to the connection to the provided stream.
      Classes in com.zebra.sdk.comm that implement Connection 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConnectionA
      Abstract class which implements the default functionality of Connection.
      class  TcpConnection
      Establishes a TCP connection to a device

      class  UsbConnection
      Establishes an Android USB connection to an attached Zebra USB printer.
